landingPage.title: [NAME OF UNIVERSITY]
landingPage.description: setting the stage for success through conversation

landingPage.title: Join us for a series of live stream talks about innovative higher education pathways, career development, and a meaningful post-service life.
landingPage.description: In partnership with Virtual Veterans Communities, NEW YORK UNIVERSITY presents is a live interview event series hosted by Veterans and Military Students for the benefit of veterans pursuing higher education.
Are you a veteran who’s ready to make the leap into higher education? Learn what you have to look forward to and prepare for your transition.

landingPage.title: We’re providing perspective, not just education.
landingPage.subtitle: Amet minim mollit non deserunt ullamco est sit aliqua dolor do amet sint
landingPage.description: The transition from military to civilian life is not an easy one. Veterans who are looking for a career path should consider higher education, but it can be difficult to know where to start. This video series will help you understand the many different types of programs available and how they might benefit your future goals!
